website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and highly portable baby mobile. An excellent value.
pros: Quickly and easily connects to cribs and most types of travel gear, including strollers, bassinets, car seats, and travel cribs
Five melodies and three colorful toys to keep babies entertained at home and on the go
cons: Spinning mechanism is a little slow

website_summaries.verdict: Built to travel, this adorable mobile boasts two separate attachment points for improved fastening versatility.
pros: Sturdy arm and clamp fasten securely to cribs, bassinets, and play yards
Velcro strap can be used for car seats and strollers
Colorful toys with black and white bellies encourage visual tracking
Friendly faces with big eyes and wide smiles invite interaction
Features five melodies and plays for up to 30 minutes
Available in a variety of styles and colors
cons: Arm and clamp require a solid surface to keep the mobile from tilting forward

customer_reviews.title: CAUGHT ON FIRE...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IT JUST CAUGHT ON FIRE. MY SON'S WAS IN HIS CRIB . IT WAS SMOKING AFTER JUST REPLACING THE BATTERIES. ONLY HAS BEEN USED FOR 2 MONTHS. WILL REPORT TO AMAZON STOP USING IT TILL IT GETS FIGURED OUT..........
customer_reviews.author: SAPPER

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from opened boxes the toy makes annoying sound in between the lullaby music.
customer_reviews.text: I got my item today, my baby loves it. However it makes annoying noise. The music is playing normally but when it's spinning makes the squeaking noise. It's so disappointing, I will wait until tomorrow if it's gone or I will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect music mobile and can go anywhere along with baby
customer_reviews.text: 1. Perfect music mobile and worth every penny.. good price as well <$25 2. Spins and plays Soothing music and auto shut-off after 30 mins 3. Multiple options- spin+ music and spin without music 4. Attaches easily to any crib, detaches and clips to any stroller, rocking chair, swings etc.. what not and can go anywhere along with the baby... 5. must have as infants starts staring at it when spins and music is sooo soothing and will fell asleep... 6. Minor complaint is that the stand doesn't hold study when fixed on soft clothes in bouncers and slowly slides when it spins...
customer_reviews.author: ILikeReviews👌

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but it squeaks something awful. Enough to keep a baby awake. Thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Angela HarrisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: huge safety risk and terrible noise
customer_reviews.text: this product is absolute garbage. I'm shocked that it has received so many 4 and 5 star reviews. Maybe I received a defective one but I couldn't keep it for even 1 hour and returning it. The motor makes a loud whirring noise that is very much noticeable when the music is turned off. It is loud enough to wake up sleeping baby. But that's less of a problem compared to the safety risk. Clamp is not strong enough to keep the mobile upright and it falls on to the side immediately risking injury to the child. Please believe the other reviewers who complained about safety.
customer_reviews.author: srk

customer_reviews.title: Does fit on the pack-and-play after some easy maneuvering!!
customer_reviews.text: Took a little figuring out to mount it properly on the pack-and-play.. it’s a bit too heavy and kept leaning forward into it almost touching the baby, however if you position it leaning back out of the pack-and-play and tighten then when the weight pulls it back forward it will sit evenly. Suspect it does this only because of the fabric covering the rails slips when tightening it. Once I got that little issue figured out I would give it 5 stars! It’s cute and quietly plays lullabies and my baby loves it!! Have also attached to the bassinet. Looking forward to putting it on the car seat if we ever need to take a long drive. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t meant to be a review video so sorry it doesn’t show the mobile much. I figured it should still provide a good idea of what it looks like. It is very simple and small. It travels well and my baby loves it. As you can see, it also attaches well to the fisher price baby dome which is nice when I want keep her content while outdoors. Not much else works so this is a must have for us.
customer_reviews.author: HaKrueg

customer_reviews.title: Not for 0-2 month olds
customer_reviews.text: My baby is almost 6 weeks old and has zero interest in this mobile. Price wise, it’s great for families on a budget. If you are like me and decided to buy something inexpensive due to age, don’t waste your money. The music is really nice but, as you can see, it doesn’t even go over your baby. Due to its weight, I would not put this on my carrier or stroller. Maybe it’s because my baby was born six weeks earlier. She is extremely aware of her surroundings but, took a concerned look and does not want anything to do with this mobile. I’ll keep it to see if she finds it interesting a few months from now.
customer_reviews.author: HarryPotterfanatic192

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I originally was very excited to receive this product, as it is finally a Musical and rotating mobile that can be used on a pack and play. My son is 4 months old but when this mobile is placed on his pack and play it is just inches away from his face. Not high enough for him to be able to enjoy the view properly. It also seems top-heavy and I am nervous that it will smack him in the face. Not as handy as I was expecting. Most disappointing part for me as probably that it doesn't sit High Enough
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NICU babies!
customer_reviews.text: We had a little one arrive a bit earlier than expected and this mobile has been a lovely addition to his hospital room. We attached it to a warming light above the crib and he is fascinated. The music is pleasant, and the rotation is slow enough for little bit bitties to focus on. One of my favorite purchases so far, and something I wish I had for our first child.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay L

customer_reviews.title: Cute but stops working after a bit :(
customer_reviews.text: At first we loved this product. The sound is enough to keep him excited at play time (although a bit loud) and he enjoys watching it spin until he falls asleep at bed time. We’ve had it for 2 months. The motor now makes an awful sound half way though the cycle and we have to turn it off before it wakes him up! This was not the case when we purchased it. No we didn’t drop it and yes we did try changing the batteries. I would not suggest this product and we shall be purchasing a different one. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lizy b.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Volume not adjustable but it’s the perfect volume, there’s really no need to adjust it. The songs are soothing too which was one of my biggest issues with others that I’ve ordered. Highly recommend especially for its versatility and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The OFF button stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The product did not have a very good grip to be installed in a pack-n-play. However, the main problem was that the off switch on this product stopped working. Thus, the product was "ON" perpetually until the battery ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Dangles in face in car seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the car seat because my baby hates being in there, when I saw I could attach to crib and bassinet as well, it seemed to be a plus. Hanging in her car seat it dangles right in her face even on the tightest notch. Tried assembling to pack and play AND bassinet, does not get tight enough and tips over into baby's face. The colors are bright and has nice contrasts for developing eyesight but will be returning because main reason was for car seat and since not even working for crib, bassinet, etc turned into complete wash :(
customer_reviews.author: Pam P.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for leaking battery fluid
customer_reviews.text: I trusted the high ratings when I ordered this for our baby, but we found battery fluid leaking in both the original order and the replacement we received after having the problem with the first mobile. The mobile had started to slow down with fainter noises, so we opened it up to exchange the batteries when we saw that the batteries had leaked. Of note, we used brand new batteries each time.
customer_reviews.author: Soo Kim

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the most useful and versatile toy I got for my newborn. It can attach to almost anything! When I was traveling for a week, I could attach it to a stroller, car seat, table, chair back....you name it! It was the only toy I brought and the only one I needed. It breaks down into 3 small pieces so I can put it in my diaper bag. The battery life is great too...two months of CONTINUOUS use and it shows no signs of stopping.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Our baby loves his new mobile
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my baby - it's enough to keep him occupied for a few minutes so we can get things done around the house. The mobile's characters are really cute and colorful! It's so easy to install, it literally took only seconds from me taking it out of the box to install it to his crib. Love that we can move the mobile from the crib to his stroller if need be, making it a portable toy!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Travels

customer_reviews.title: The first one arrived in perfect condition but when it was turned on
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this mobile because of the versatility and mobility. The first one arrived in perfect condition but when it was turned on, it made a VERY loud squeezing noise while turning. Thinking we got a defective product we exchanged it for another one. Unfortunately, the same thing happened with the new one. It's a great looking product, and the versatility sold us but the quality is just not there. It's a shame as there are not many products on the market quite like this.
customer_reviews.author: Carie

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Music is just right. Not too loud or too soft. I prefer a little louder though. I can hear the machine ticking while its circling around- doesnt bother me though. Its cute, but too tiny. Wish its bigger. Otherwise, it serves its purpose After 5 months of usage Holds up. My baby is 5 mo and he reaches out, grabs and pulls it. It still works and has not come apart which Im surprise. My son loves this. If I have to buy another mobile, Id buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters favorite toy. She will spend 20 mins just staring at it. It’s great if you need to put her down to get some things done around the house. I love feedback so please let me know if this review was Helpful or not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mathers

customer_reviews.title: No auto off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same mobile two years ago, and the old version turned off (music and spinning) automatically after about 30 minutes. The current version stops playing music after 30 minutes, BUT the rotation remains on. It rotates all day and night unless we remember to manually turn it off - what sleepless new parent can? - and the batteries die very quickly as a result. I much preferred the prior auto-off product.
customer_reviews.author: Aimhigh

customer_reviews.title: So cute & durable too
customer_reviews.text: I love this mobile! I love that it doesn’t play continuous music too Long, but can also turn without music as well. I love that it’s portable! We’ve used this for 3 or our boys now, starting off with using it on the car seat to mute out the ambient noise, until they learn to reach it. Then we transition it to the crib or pack n play where they nap. Once my boy got older he would wake up, stand up in his crib to turn the button on, then lie back down & watch it spin & listen to music, waiting for us to get him. So cute & durable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This product has paid for itself many times over. I am an exclusive pumper and need to be able to put my baby down so I can pump. We keep this on his pack and play and he just loves it! He coos and laughs at it and it makes him so happy. No volume control but I don't find this to be too loud or anything. I like that it runs for awhile as I am stuck pumping and can't be running to turn it on and off frequently. I also like that it's small and we can travel with it. If you're considering this, definitely pull the trigger!
customer_reviews.author: Durga D

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The sound volume is not adjustable but for the price, I cannot complain. Overall, this mobile is great! I had a bad experience with another mobile that we purchased for a higher price, so in comparison, this mobile is super! I feel that it's safe, sturdy and is attached well and will not fall on the baby. I love that it can be used anywhere, in the crib, bassinet, stroller, etc. It's super easy to attach or detach. The music is nice and soothing and the toys move around when it's on. I highly recommend this mobile!
customer_reviews.author: anatoly

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing, and so does my baby.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute mobile. I love that I can use it on her bassinet, stroller, and even her car seat. My only complaint is that I wish it had more options for the volume. There is only one setting for the volume which is a little on the loud side when I want to play it at night for her to fall asleep. There is an option for it to spin only without sound, but the lever has to be pushed past the music option which causes it to play a second of the song. The order should have been off, spin only, and then spin and music. Overall though it is a good mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Mystic

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today. I was immediately excited to open it. I opened a new pack of batteries. Inserted them and turned it on. It spun for a few seconds and then quit. Kept acting like it was already dying and getting stuck on something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! It’s so sweet. Adorable characters that my little one is mesmerized by, sweet soothing music, and an option to have it rotate with music or without! We also love that it auto shuts off (awesome for bedtime). I do wish the auto shut off was a Feature you could control, for longer time frames sometimes. I love that you can put it nearly anywhere also! We hang it from our bassinet. I’d also like to use it on our car seat and pack and play! The only thing that concerns me is that it sometimes slips when using the bar attachment. You have to get it just right. Overall, we would buy another and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. Period. First of all, it’s super flimsy. And the way to attach it to the crib is incredibly unsafe. We tried to tighten it real secure but it always end up falling into the crib!! Thank goodness we tried it set it up long before baby arrived. Who knows what could’ve happened in the middle of the night?? Anyways the sound is okay... music is alright if you’re okay with the constant buzzing of the motor that actually swallows up the music. I think the concept of it being able to be broken down to be portable is great. Just poooooorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: 13filmcust

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bassinet, car seat, and crib!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the negative reviews, I thought I'd take a chance, since this seemed to check all the boxes I was looking for in a mobile for my son's bassinet and crib. It was indeed easy to set up, and keeps my son entertained when he's awake. This is absolutely what I was looking for! Read the instructions for assembly if you aren't getting it just right. No issues with it falling over or Velcro coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: kaceykaso

customer_reviews.title: I would pay $5 for it.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied? Nope because it feels like a renewed product from the preowned. Why? The sound quality. There is no quality because even a sound box sounds better than it. Infants like the high contract items but the colors of the hanging toys are dull. Thank to the iPhone optimizing the video colors. Otherwise, you won’t see the colors are that sharp. Battery housing lid require screw driver to lock it. At last, the mounting is 90% decorative and 10% workable because it only can mount at one certain angle. It will fall off if going a little bit further.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: After about 30 seconds it makes a loud noise when spinning
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this mobile, because it is cute, but it's just not good. The music is always very loud, there is no way to quiet it down, but it does not matter because after about 30 seconds, the thing starts making this loud mechanical noise as it spins. It kind of sounds like a windup toy. It is definitely not conducive to sleep. Also, the mechanism to attach it to the crib does not tighten very well giving it the possibility of falling. It just isn't safe. I would not suggest this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Talya

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it, so I do too
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how I was going to like it since it was my first mobile I’ve purchased, but I love it because my daughter loves it. She will lay in bed and watch it while she falls asleep. I’ll lay her down while she’s sleepy and turn it on and she just lays there quietly and watches it turn and hears the music. The music is loud enough, but not too loud and very soothing. Some mornings she will wake up and stare up at it and “talk” to it, it’s just adorable. She is 3 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact mobile
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a lightweight baby mobile for our bassinet and this is it! It’s not too big and is the right size for our Fisher Price rocking bassinet. Super easy to assemble. It plays 3 or 4 classical music songs. I love the fact that I can have is doing and not play music. The little animals and b/w patterns keep my LO entertained. The travel/to go multi-function option is a plus, but I’ll be using it as just a mobile for now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Top-heavy. Loud. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: This mobile was cute but had some major deal-breakers. It is cheaply made, top-heavy, the grip is weak and therefore it would not stay in place. It would just slide forward until it fell into my baby’s face. I tried several different ways and positions and it was a resounding no-go. I tried it on the Halo Bassinest. I’m addition to all that, the little motor inside is loud and distracting/ the last thing you want for a mobile!! Returned.
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: So versatile! A must have imho
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. I bought it to put on my daughter's swing since the one on it did not rotate. It fit well on the swing but I then moved it to her play mat (as pictured) and it fit well on there too! Provides lots of enjoyment for my almost 2 month old. It's well built not too heavy. Only con for me is the song is loud with no volume control. Not a big deal. I put it on rotate with no sound. It has an automatic shutdown after a few minutes to save your batteries. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: leeann

customer_reviews.title: Such a great distraction!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing on the edge of the crib - easy to hook on and off and move around. It's such a great distraction for the little one even without the music going. The colors are great and there are a few different tunes that peak his attention. I can leave him watching this for a solid 15-20 minutes at a time when I need to get something done and not have to worry about him getting bored!
customer_reviews.author: LacyLampe

customer_reviews.title: Great for the car!
customer_reviews.text: I would give 4 stars because there is no volume control, but it has saved us in the car so I’m giving 5. My son didn’t like being in the car for a long time. I got this and attached to the car seat and it has helped a ton. Keeps him entertained watching them go by. I did cut the string legs off the deer because they were getting too close to his face. It’s easy to assemble and attach to different products, like the pak n play. There is no volume control though. The level is pretty good where it is but it’d be nice if there were a couple levels.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not working after one day!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. After having it for one day and using it twice, it stopped spinning and the same song repeats. Maybe I got a defected one or maybe they’re just bad quality product either way returning and not getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but hangs too close to baby's face. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Cute product, great overall idea, but not very useful. I bought this for the pack n play, however like other reviews said, it does tip sideways or forward. I can't use this with the pack n play bassinet attachment though as is hangs so low it is in the baby's face. I tried just using the clip part on the baby car seat or activity mat and it still hangs so low that it literally is in the baby's face there too. It seems that I will have to wait until the baby is big enough to use the pack n play without the bassinet in order for this product to be of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product.  Should Be on Every Baby Registry
customer_reviews.text: This thing allows me to work from home. This thing lets me take baby to work. All hail this thing. The majority of the mommies in my facebook group have this thing. I'm talking 90/120ish of them that answered the poll. It seems like a few of our October Babies had it, and then a few more, and then a few more. Slowly, everyone started buying it for their babies because everyone else was mad about it. Capitalism at its finest. It really is the most amazing product. It's so versatile with how you can hang it.
customer_reviews.author: JA Family

customer_reviews.title: Portable and perfect for baby!
customer_reviews.text: This portable mobile is easy to assemble and use. Thankfully my 3 month old loves his mobiles, so this was nice to have for his bassinet and stroller. There is no volume control, but the volume is perfect for us, not to loud nor to quiet. The claw is strong and holds sturdy. The connection piece does in the bassinet due to the fabric on the bassinet frame, so we had to mod it a little too hold up, not the fault of the mobile though. We and baby definitely love this mobile!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Slipped off of pack n play frame
customer_reviews.text: We attached this to our baby's crib, and it worked well enough. However, we took this on a trip and attached it to a pack n play. The clamp was not sturdy enough to attach safely to any side of the pack n play. After I tried attaching it in a corner where the plastic frame was thicker, the clamp actually slowly slipped off and fell on our baby!! We won't be using this again
customer_reviews.author: RasikaSKS

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a playpen!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this so I can’t review the battery life of durability. I originally thought the speed was too slow but after watching for a bit I don’t mind the speed. The sound is a good volume. It’s too bad that you can’t adjust the volume but I knew that from reading the reviews. I haven’t used it without the arm base yet. It was bought specifically for my daughters playpen. I feel as long as you tighten it, it is sturdy. My daughter loves it! She outgrew her bassinet with mobile so I’m glad I found her something for her playpen.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not soothing melodies and loud
customer_reviews.text: My son is having a hard time sleeping so I decided to buy this item mainly for the music, hoping it will soothe him. However the music is obnoxiously loud And not soothing melodies ! If I can recognize it as loud I can only imagine how loud it is for my son with his sensitive ears. There is no way you can adjust that which is very disappointing. The designs of this mobile is okay, nothing too impressive, my son didn’t seem to care or catch his attention at all.
customer_reviews.author: Thuy

customer_reviews.title: Awful Buzzing Sound
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 3 1/2 months now. My baby loves the cute little animals BUT unfortunately, sometimes it works fine and other times it doesn't. When it doesn't, it makes an awful buzzing sound. I've included a video. Aside from that, I wish it had volume control. It is very loud at night so I don't even bother with it then. I'm way past the return date so I can't even get this replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Donuts

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can basically carry this anywhere you want or you could put it above your crib o pack and play. My son fell asleep from the lullaby. It's extremely easy to put together and take apart. You will need 3 double A batteries. The main thing I don't like about it is that you cant adjust the volume setting and I wish it has some lights. For $25 I would expect more for it, to be honest. But it's doable for now.
customer_reviews.author: Izarmgm

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little mobile! My son loves mobiles and this one was definitely not excluded. It plays a series of cute tunes, not too loud. And has the option for the mobile to spin without music. It doesn’t do well on the arm of a car seat like the picture shows. When I put it on the arm, it was too close to my baby’s face. So I just clamped it on the side of the seat, worked great. It’s so easy to disconnect, that we take it everywhere. We move it from his PackNPlay, to his RockNPlay, to his car seat, to his changing table. It fits anywhere. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falls constantly off crib rail - does not tighten well.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how tight I make the mobile’s arm grip the crib railing, it constantly falls. The first few times have been right on my newborns (1mo) face. It’s nice that the mobile can detach from the arm. I use the mobile on the swing we have. I’m trying to find a new mobile arm that I can attach the mobile to. Please don’t get this!!! Find one that attaches to the crib NOT like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie-Boolie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and portable
customer_reviews.text: This is exaclty what I was looking for! My baby loves her mobiles right now and this gives us the ability to have it wherever she is. It fits perfectly on her pack and play and travels easily. Update: used this for several longer car rides and it kept my 3 month old entranced and quiet. Secured easily to her car seat and was easy to restart for the passenger by turning around slightly. Definitely saved us on those trips.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Amanda MillerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: 5 month old approved!
customer_reviews.text: The mobile is great - it keeps my 5 month old occupied for at least 20 - 30 min stretches - the design is great because he can see the characters. With other mobiles he basically looks at the butt of characters. The volume is not adjustable but you can let it spin with no sound. Great for attaching to car seat and stroller as well. Attached well to the SNOO bassinet and the Graco travel system. It has started making a weird noise while spinning (after using it for about 3 weeks). Will update review if any issues - so far there hasn’t been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: PM83

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I so love this little mobile. It is adorable and I can fit on my changing table, car seat, bassinet, crib rail and playpen! It is very very cute. No problems with mine, wish it were volume adjustable but even tho it isn’t it’s a non-issue- there IS an option to have No volume and still have the mobile in rotation. Wish these had existed with all of my other babies! I am very happy I bought this and plan on getting another with a different color scheme. Don’t really need to buy another as this is easily moved from one place to another- but I just like it that much that I want two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Norman

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband laughed at me when I bought this for our Pack N Play, now he uses it to help our boy settle down! It does have a variety of mounting options. It can be mounted with the arm it comes with, a plastic clamp detaches from the arm and could be attached elsewhere, and a velcro strap detaches from the clamp. The automatic shut off is great and doesn't seem to disturb out little guy. The colors and patterns really grab his attention and keeps him very interested.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: It just falls over! I tried to attach it to the bassinet and also the pack and play and even though it’s as tight as it goes, it just falls right over. Additionally, the mobile is too close to the baby, it doesn’t go high enough so it’s way too close to my baby’s face. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Small and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Emphasis on tiny. This is definitely a small crib mobile. The animals are cute and the colors are vibrant. The music is calm yet grabs my son's attention. I wish the wand extended out a bit further because this mobile just hangs over the railing of the crib (which is a standard sized crib). If the wand was bigger it would reach the middle of the crib. Right now I have to move my son close to the railing in order for him to see this. Which is fine but when he moves he bangs his arms against the railing.
customer_reviews.author: Tabeer Javed

customer_reviews.title: Grateful this mobile didn't fall on our 5 week old's face.
customer_reviews.text: This product would have received 5 stars had I reviewed it within 48 hours of purchase; it is engaging for our baby, has nice music, and is incredibly convenient for bassinets, etc. The multiple hanging options are also convenient. Unfortunately, the product broke within a week; the seam on the small band that attaches the mobile to the "claw" attachment came undone and the mobile fell into the bassinet. We are grateful our little man wasn't in his bassinet when it happened. If you order this, please triple check to make sure all seams and attachment "joints" are secure.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H.

customer_reviews.title: Loud, but otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable, and my son loves it! I love that it can attach to our co sleeper, unlike most mobiles which only attach to cribs. Only two con's so far: 1. The music is pretty loud. I wish it had a volume control switch. 2. It came to me in an obviously already opened box, and the zip ties that would normally hold everything in place before use were cut. I can't speak for the longevity of this yet, but so far, all things considered, its a great pick for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MommaEngland

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works well
customer_reviews.text: This mobile is very cute and really nice quality. It spins with or without the music. The music is a pleasant lullaby tune that's soothing to little ones. There isn't an option for different volumes but the sound level it uses is perfect, in my opinion: not too loud, not too soft. I liked the attachment mechanism on this particular mobile because it did not require being put through crib slats like so many of them do. I wanted one that would also attach to a bassinet (as opposed to just a crib) and this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: My 3 Month Old Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My son (now 3 months - 14 weeks) loves this mobile!! It keeps him entertained for several minutes at a time and has done so since he was about 10 weeks old. Super easy to assemble and attach to various baby products like the crib, bassinet and rocker. I love that it has both colors and black and white contrast images and the option for it to rotate with or without music. A very great purchase for parents in search of toys for small babies and looking for something to do with infants who are having increasing period of awake time
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after 2 months! Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Though the volume isn’t controllable, my baby loves this mobile and we use it all the time! Definitely recommend! Edit: I’ve had this for like 2 months and the music skips beats and just randomly skips to the next song. It’s so bad that it wakes my baby. I no longer recommend if you want to use it longer than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Good entertainment for newborns; keep out of reach from older babies.
customer_reviews.text: My newborn baby likes this. She hates being on the changing table but this has made it a bit more tolerable for her and now she doesn't get upset everytime because she is distracted. It doesn't have volume control but it's not loud. It seems like a perfect volume, personally. However once your baby starts beong able to pull things and sit up, make sure it's our of reach because it isn't durable. A baby could easily pull this thing down.
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This little mobile may not look like much, but holy cow does it work great! My little 2 month old just stares at it in awe as it turns and plays music. I love that he's entertained by it while also allowing me to sneak away long enough to run to the bathroom or load the washing machine. Not that I advocate leaving your baby unattended, but sometimes when you're alone in the house and need to just distract him in his pack n play for a few minutes to get other things done, it's a life saver! He's content and entertained, and I can do a little multi-tasking around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors but Possible hazzard
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to clamp tight enough on rails to be safe— fell over and landed on my baby once— luckily didn’t hurt her I still use it but at a distance that it can’t land on her in case it comes loose again I really liked the color scheme
customer_reviews.author: Jill B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, its an amazing product Easy to assemble Portable and easy to carry with stroller, swings and play gym Music is soothing Noice level is decent and just perfect to allow baby to go in sleep I believe no other crib mobile can beat this one for features/dollar metric Only thing that could have been better is that the colors of toys are same, it should be more diversified combination for active baby engagement
customer_reviews.author: Kan

customer_reviews.title: This mobile is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This mobile is amazing. It is the first thing my two-month-old son has taken any interest in looking at or watching. We borrowed the colorful version of this mobile from a friend, but our son wasn’t into it. Then we bought ourselves a black-and-white version, and we’ve taken to calling it baby TV, because he can just watch it for hours. I can actually see his eyes tracking the little animals on the mobile. It’s amazing. I’m watching him learn to watch and focus on things for the very first time, and this mobile is the number one thing he’s interested in watching.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Tabitha Bunbury

customer_reviews.title: First and only mobile ever!
customer_reviews.text: Baby and I love this mobile. Music is nice and relaxing. It’s not too loud and not too soft. He enjoys the black and white designs and the animals. I love the fact that I can take the mobile off and clip it to something else like his car seat handle. The only thing I wish it could do was extend he bar out a little more. Since it’s clipped to the side of the crib, he’s always near the edge of the crib and I like to have him more centered. But it’s no biggie. I’ll take him being quiet and falling asleep any day.
customer_reviews.author: T Winn

customer_reviews.title: Kept baby totally entranced
customer_reviews.text: We used this on a "Baby box" until my son was about 4.5 months. WE put him in the box to sleep when he was newborn, then used it to change him in our living room. This mobile was one of the few things he would stare at intently. It was one of the first things he started smiling at and "Talking" to. If he was fussing when we put him down, this almost always calmed him. We love it and absolutely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: D.Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for Small Space/Crib
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfect for the portable crib. It is made for the baby's perspective so does not have a lot of impressive adult view but that is not the reason for mobile. If you want to buy super cute so the room looks nice to adults, skip this. But, if your intention is to entertain baby with characters that fully represent themselves to his/her perspective and have a nice (not too loud obnoxious sound), buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Stavia

customer_reviews.title: Best baby purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite baby purchase of all time. I love this mobile because it has an arm which can be attached to a rail on a crib or pack and play. The mobile can also be removed from the arm and has a Velcro loop that can be attached to a car seat, stroller, etc. It is perfect for on the go and it really helps sooth/entertain my daughter when we are out. Has a sound mute option as well that allows mobile to spin without noise. HIGHLY recommend and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore this mobile!!! 2.5 years ago, We purchased one for our son. After a couple of years, my niece was born and we lent it to her. Recently, we had our second child. She loves it so much that we couldn’t ask for it back! We just purchased our second mobile, in a different color/theme and I’m proud to report it’s a winner with baby #2 as well. Only reason I gave this review 3 stars was because I’m pretty sure this mobile had already been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Krista and Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Fancy but not worth it .
customer_reviews.text: This toy for new born or baby up to 5 month. The volume is very small and it doesn’t have that access to increase or decrease volume.It runs on battery so you have buy additional batteries .Their are five ringtones but the baby won’t like it it’s not music it sounds like irrritating noise for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sonam

customer_reviews.title: Top-Heavy and leans over
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves to look at this mobile. It has nice contrasting black and white patterns as well as bright primary colors which catch my 8-week-old's attention. The major downside is that it is very top-heavy and no matter how much I tighten the gripper, it will eventually lean over and sit in my kid's face. Now, he's a very easy-going 8-week-old so he doesn't really care...but I do. That said, I'll only put it on his bassinet when I can fully supervise him and remove the mobile from his face.
customer_reviews.author: KDS

customer_reviews.title: Motor became annoyingly loud after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: It was great, operating at 5 star levels for the first month or two. Baby would hypnotically watch the mobile turn and fall asleep. I thought I had the deal of the century - I was going to buy a second for the car seat... aaaaannnnddddd then out of nowhere, the motor on the mobile started to become annoyingly loud. The loud motor countered the soothing sounds of the music; baby would just stay awake. You get what you pay for I guess?
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Baby's favorite
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it wouldn't work on my baby's co sleeper but once I placed it at the top of his bed, perfect fit! It does require double A batteries, but other than than that, it's perfect for us. Easy to assemble...I didn't have to read the instructions. The music is clear and plays at a good volume. My baby is memorized by this mobile and it's cute. It says you can put it on your car seat, but I think it's too big and would be on your babes face.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe S

customer_reviews.title: This mobile is awesome. Our son loves to watch the little animal ...
customer_reviews.text: This mobile is awesome. Our son loves to watch the little animal friends and it keeps him entertained for 20 - 30 minutes at a time. My only complaint is that I wish the arm was longer / taller and a little more sturdy. I was able to find a spot on his pack and play that can hold up the mobile (it is kind of heavy). However I was not able to get it to connect to his rock n play without it sagging too close to his face. I really like that you can detach the mobile from the arm. I have clipped it to his play mat on the ground and also on his car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Hanks MamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Loud motor
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to assemble and looks cute. I had to return item due to the motor continuously making a buzzing noise as it spins, keeping baby awake. There is also no volume control and the music is a bit loud for being so close to baby as he's trying to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi Brown

customer_reviews.title: Secure on pack n play, good visual from baby’s perspective
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, attaches securely to pack n play, turn off music for quieter moments but mobile continues to turn, good visual-graphics,colors, angle for baby to see.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Great for playards!
customer_reviews.text: Great mobile for a playard! The clamp for the arm connects it to the playard very sturdily. We like that it can also be clipped anywhere else or strapped with the Velcro. The black and white patterns on the hanging animals is nice because babies look more at high contrast patterns. It’s nice that you can have this rotate without playing music. We have a separate sound machine for white noise and I was specifically looking for a mobile without music. Update: I didn’t realize that this has an auto shut off function. It turns itself off after 30 minutes. Handy when you don’t want to waste the battery with it running while your baby is sound asleep.
customer_reviews.author: T. Le

customer_reviews.title: Great portable mobile that baby loves !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little travel mobile! It’s easy to clamp on and off so I can move it from place to place as needed. And the best part is my baby loves it! If she loves it I love it! I wish it had lights but other than that it’s great. The music is nice and last about 20 minutes I think. Definitely recommend as a easy travel mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E

customer_reviews.title: Great Infant Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Love this infant mobile. Keeps baby entertained for short periods of time so I can do a few things & know he will be content in his crib watching the mobile for 10 minutes. I just wish it didnt turn off after 30 minutes. Also wish that the no sound option was first & that you didn't have to click past the music to get to silent. Overall great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Clings well with pack and play
customer_reviews.text: Because of the price it was surprising that I liked it. My baby's original mobile broke and so i had to replace it but that was too expensive and found this at Amazon for half its price. It clings well with pack and play, not sure with a regular crib though. You cannot control the volume but my baby likes the music. I would say it is worth its price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good.  I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricier than I’d like but it’s very versatile. I have a Grace glider with wimpy bears hanging over baby on this flimsy bar. I took off the bar (well actually it kept falling off) and put this on. Baby loves it! Makes a great nap spot. Also works well for pack and play (I have a cheap one wo the bassinet feature so he’s just laying deep down in there). My son is 4 months so he’s not very mobile. We’ve used for about a month and I think it was a good purchase. I’d recommend purchasing this. Save money some other way like buying a used swing or jumper - ha ha.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, portable distraction
customer_reviews.text: Attached it to my Summer Infant changing table because our newborn goes ballistic when it comes to diaper changes. When his eyes aren't shut from crying at the top of his lungs, he is actually really interested in the mobile. I like that it has a mute function and that it was super easy to assemble. It is battery powered so make sure you have them on hand since they aren't included in the package. I took one star off because though it was "new", it was received dirty (ie, black flecks on one of the arms) so I wiped it down before setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: 143amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel mobile
customer_reviews.text: Baby is obsessed with this. I mostly use it clipped to his pack and play. He is 3 months old and I can set him down and let him watch this while i switch laundry, etc. it’s a great help for short bursts of time. I wish it had a slightly lower volume and I’d use it at bedtime, but it’s a little too loud and stimulating for that
customer_reviews.author: MobileReader

customer_reviews.title: Best toy, must have
customer_reviews.text: Best $20 I ever spent she loves this thing so much I put it on her crib I put it on her play gym I put it on her stroller she adores it I do have to change the batteries frequently but that's because we use it so much I highly recommend it definitely definitely get it I like the black and white too because she can see that well
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Manz

customer_reviews.title: It would only be better with lights
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughter. She loved staring at the fan in our room, so we got her one of these for her bassinet. It has an auto off function so it does not run all night. the volume is set, but is not too loud or soft. The only way this could be better is if it had some soft lights with it. No complaints. Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Grizzzly

customer_reviews.title: Makes a terrible grinding noise after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: The mobile worked fine for a few weeks, but then it began to make a grinding noise while it was in operation. Still spins fine, music works, but it sounds awful. Replaced the batteries twice, same problem. It's as though the motor is strained, or the gears inside are stripping, but either way, it's not very relaxing. This all happened before the baby could reach the mobile, so it hasn't been damaged by grabbing/holding. It just seems to have a low quality motor.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good, but makes annoying noise
customer_reviews.text: My 7 week old loves looking at this thing and actually focuses on it for a while. I like that the animals face down. It’s got nice bright colors. However, it is making an annoying loud noise when spinning. Super irritating and is almost louder than the music. I hope it’s just a defect on this one and not all. I will exchange and hope the next one works better
customer_reviews.author: Jelly

customer_reviews.title: My newborn grand daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all of the positive reviews and I am so glad that I did. I babysit my newborn grand daughter and she loves this mobile. She is very alert and will be mesmerized with the music and the movement of the mobile. I put her in the pack n play and the mobile entertainment gives me 10 to 15 minutes to get stuff done.
customer_reviews.author: Brownieyumyum

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what I would do without this
customer_reviews.text: My baby absolutely adores this!! We use it all the time - at first I bought it to attach to her SNOO and now we move it to all her placards or cribs that she would be in. We love that she can watch it to occupy herself. She can spend an hour just staring at it! A must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Aloha_EC

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel-Size Mobile
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves the sound and the fabric animals on this. My husband and I (though more me than my husband) like that there is the option to have the mobile turn without the sound. My husband likes the music...I enjoy it too, but I have to admit it's a tiny bit loud for me. I just have sensitive ears. I haven't attached it to our little one's stroller yet, so I'm not sure how she'll like that, but so far, I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Vu

customer_reviews.title: This is AMAZING & it works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: My little Grand-daughter wasn't able to sleep in her crib, so my Daughter selected this product! They sent a video of this hanging over her cradle & she was fast asleep with the music playing! They said she just kept her eyes fixed upon the brightly colored characters dancing around! Thank-you so much for this excellent mobile, that has helped baby, Momma & Daddy get some sleep! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hildebrandt

customer_reviews.title: Love !
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect take along mobile ! It has different parts to it so you can attach it to many things . I used this with my Mamaroo as a more interactive mobile but as my child got older , I attached it to the clothes hanger in my backseat and my son still loves it at 1 year old . Overall it was a great little investment .
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great idea made into a total piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed. My baby boy, loves mobiles and I really wanted one we could take everywhere or move around the house wherever he is. However, this thing was of poor quality, the arm moves around without locking into position and the rotation was so slow my baby didn't even notice it. He is totally mesmerized by anything that moves, even the fan, but he hardly looked at this mobile because it moved so slow. I would describe this as a piece of junk. If they would have put a better motor in and made the arm more sturdy this would have been great. As it was so bad, I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: YlwRoseTx

customer_reviews.title: Sanity saver!
customer_reviews.text: My son is very anti car seat and it was a a struggle getting anything done. He loves the mobile in his crib so I wondering if a mobile for the car seat would help. He loves it!! He loves things that move and make noise so this is perfect. It slowly spins and plays music for 30 min! I don't have to worry about winding it while we are shopping or anything as it just keeps playing. I love this thing and am so glad it's an on the go options to use on his car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4-month old loves this! We got it when she was two months, thinking the high contrast would be good. She felt so-so about it then, but now just smiles so big and coos when she’s looking at it. I love that we can move it easily from crib to pack n’ play to bassinet easily and securely. The music is also nice, less annoying than some other baby music. The only thing is that there is no volume control — we put some tape over the speaker part to soften the sound and that seems to have done the trick. Overall, very satisfied and totally worth the reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Note the stand length, but well designed for a variety of scenarios
customer_reviews.text: My original intent for this was to have a distraction on the changing table. I guess I wasn't paying attention when ordering, but the stand is really short - it's really only designed for hanging over a crib. However, the design is really smart, as it has a clip so you can attach it to anything without the stand, and then the clip is removable if you want to attach to anything else. I ended up stringing up the mobile via some yarn to a ceiling eyelet I installed above the changing station, and it works. Did not put batteries in due to weight concerns, but the mobile will spin manually.
customer_reviews.author: ffej101

customer_reviews.title: Noises not helpful for sleeping babies.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today. I bought 2, one for each of tong two month old twins. I put them in their pack and play for nap time and we aren’t even 30 minutes in to their first use and one of them is making this awful scratching sound when it goes around. The other one, right off the bat you could hear the mechanics of the thing turning. Would not recommend this product if you want your baby to actually sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Too loud, no volume control
customer_reviews.text: We love this but it is too loud and doesnt have to option to turn it down. You can have it spin without sound, but cant have the sound with no spin. This would have been a great option. There needs to be sound control on it! I haven't used it enough to rate an accurate battery quality. It clicks when it gets caught and is still working, so I would say the durability is good so far! It had been making a weird echo like sound at one point, so sound quality could be better as well.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMomx3

customer_reviews.title: Great portable mobile with motion!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little mobile. I love the fact that this thing is portable and has 3 different hanging options. There is no control for the volume (it’s a bit loud) but you can turn it off and have the mobile turn without music so that is a plus when it’s just too loud. Animal characters and overall look of this mobile is cute and modern with the black/white/grey colors scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile, mounting pole didnt work for us.
customer_reviews.text: I like how this mobile has classical music, rather than the traditional tune. Also love the long play option, you just flip the switch and it keeps going. Love the design of being able to unclip the mobile part and put it on a pack n play, genius! The only thing i didn't like was the attachment pole for the crib didn't fit our standard 'dream on me' crib. Wasnt wide enough to clamp onto the railing. I had to order a separate attachment pole to get it mounted on the crib. Good thing I could just clip the mobile part on.
customer_reviews.author: Dipenkara

product_meta.title: Tiny Love Take Along Mobile, Animal Friends, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Animal FriendsThe Tiny Love Take Along Mobile is a colorful and engaging mobile that easily goes everywhere with your baby. From a very young age, babies will appreciate the sense of security and continuity invoked by taking this mobile along everywhere they go. It features 30 minutes of 5 different melodies to help soothe and amuse your little one. The colorful hanging toys spin to provide your baby with visual stimulation. This adaptable mobile is designed to easily attach to most play yards, strollers and bassinets so that you can take it along wherever the day takes you and baby. We recommend attaching this toy to a crib side that is fixed and cannot move up or down
feature_bullets: FUN AT HOME AND ON THE GO – Take-Along Mobile lets you take the fun anywhere
EASY ATTACHMENT – Goes wherever baby goes. Use on cribs, play yards, carriers, strollers, bassinets and more
CONTINUOUS ENTERTAINMENT – 30 minutes of uninterrupted music, with 5 different engaging melodies
ENGAGE AND DELIGHT BABY – Spinning toys visually stimulate and delight baby. Age - 0 to 6 months
TINY LOVE PROMISE – At Tiny Love, we help parents to encourage their baby’s development by inspiring Moments of Wonder that they can share together

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars7,017 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
